sentence: tassa te, āvuso, alābhā, tassa te dulladdhaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karosī'ti, idaṃ tasmiṃ mohanake pācittiyaṃ.
